profile_data.summary:
I am a highly motivated and academically accomplished individual with a strong educational background in both Data Science and Industrial & Systems Engineering. I completed my Master of Science degree in Data Science with a focus on Language Intelligence from Texas A&M University, where I maintained a perfect GPA of 4.0/4.0.

With a rich background in AI research and data science, I have dedicated my career to developing innovative solutions that drive meaningful impact. During my tenure at LG CNS Co. Ltd, I spearheaded groundbreaking projects in anomaly detection, cloud platform optimization, and real-time fraud detection, achieving remarkable results that surpassed industry standards. As a Research Specialist in the Vision AI Lab, I led the development of cutting-edge anomaly detection solutions, leveraging out-of-distribution detection techniques to outperform traditional methods. Additionally, my role as a Senior AI Researcher allowed me to architect advanced fraud detection systems for leading banking and e-commerce clients, delivering unparalleled accuracy rates and enhancing operational efficiency.

In my previous roles, including as a Data Science Associate at LG CNS Co. Ltd and a Research Trainee at Hindustan Unilever Research Centre, I honed my skills in compression algorithms, image processing, and mathematical modeling. My experience extends beyond industry settings, as I have also contributed to academic research endeavors at institutions like National Chiao Tung University, where I optimized supply chain networks and developed linear mathematical models.

Equipped with expertise in meta-heuristics, optimization, and machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow and PyTorch, I thrive in dynamic environments where I can leverage technology to solve complex challenges. My proficiency in data handling, statistical analysis, and experimental design enables me to extract actionable insights from complex datasets, driving informed decision-making and driving business growth.

As I continue to evolve in the field of data science and AI, I am passionate about collaborating with like-minded professionals to push the boundaries of innovation and create solutions that positively impact society. With a strong foundation in deep learning, model deployment, and software development, I am excited to embark on new challenges and contribute to transformative projects that shape the future of AI and technology.

Let's connect and explore opportunities to collaborate on impactful projects in the realm of data science and artificial intelligence.
profile_data.headline: Senior MLE @ Visa | MSDS @ TAMU | Former Senior AI Engineer at LG CNS Co., Ltd. | HUL Bangalore | NCTU Taiwan | IIT Kharagpur | Computer Vision, NLP, LLM, Gen AI, Model Deployment, Anomaly Detection, Real-Time Solutions

experience.description:
- Working in collaboration with Tenaris S.A.’s (TENARIS) quality assurance team
- Developing and testing advanced data analytics tools for manufacturing quality assurance, including predictive models for different treatment processes and comparative analyses across different locations.
- Performing numeric analysis of process control variables and comparing product quality findings between facilities, enhancing predictive accuracy and process understanding.
experience.title: Graduate Assistant Researcher

experience.description:
- Worked on a project funded by the Department of Homeland Security.
- Developed Bayesian Network Models to optimize data processes and enhance the efficiency of Food, Water, Natural Gas and Pharma supply chains, significantly reducing collection times.
- Led the cross-border data collection and integration of over 175 datasets, utilizing statistical models for strategic decision-making.
- Worked on Probabilistic Risk Assessment to manage risks in complex systems using probabilistic approaches.
-Implemented data lakes and robust data management workflows to streamline data collection, storage, and processing across sectors.
experience.title: Graduate Student Assistant

experience.description:
 Created a computer vision model capable of simultaneously classifying, detecting and
tracking multiple objects, utilizing a unified backbone for feature extraction. Trained and
tested the entire model interface using the Pytorch framework
 Facilitated the selection of a common backbone and optimal pre-processing methods
for the project, contributing a majority of the effort
 Collaborated with the model deployment team to deploy inference models for various
vision tasks in C++
 Successfully balanced the overall model performance, run-time speed, compatibility, and
resource utilization
 Significantly contributed to the development of anomaly detection models utilizing
CCTV images as input
 Created a real-time Transaction Fraud Detector for a client bank in Korea using an
adversarial autoencoder.
 Expanded the adversarial autoencoder to perform other anomaly detection tasks on
structured datasets.
 Compared the performance of the developed deep learning model with traditional
Machine learning models like XGBoost and Random Forest, which required standard
feature processing techniques unlike deep learning
experience.title: Senior AI Engineer

experience.description:
 The work involved creating a food ingredient database of nutrient proportion for all the macro as well as micronutrients and further, a mathematical model was formulated which takes three input - 
        i. geographical location
        ii. dietary guidelines
        iii. age category of the user. 
 Output displays a food plate containing the list of ingredients to be consumed in order to meet the daily allowance for all the nutrients. 
 Additionally, we sought to implement the role of Tea in the food plate solutions obtained and check whether it reduces the plate cost.
experience.title: Summer Intern at Hindustan Unliver R&D

projects.description:
• Developed a movie recommender system by scraping data from IMDB and creating embedding vectors for each movie by fine-tuning Distil BERT on metadata.
• Implemented hybrid recommendation methods incorporating item-item collaborative filtering, Matrix Factorization, and content-based approaches.
• Designed a chatbot using Gemini to facilitate user interaction and generate search queries based on individual preferences, improving usability and engagement by harnessing generative deep learning models.
• Created and managed the dataset pipeline, ensuring efficient data extraction, processing, and storage for model training and evaluation to achieve an average Mean Reciprocal Rank (MRR) and Precision@10 of above 0.8 for test queries, demonstrating the effectiveness of the recommendation system.
projects.title: MFLIX – An Innovative and Personalized Movie Recommendation Application using LLMs
